ModMetaData.name: Shin-Ra Company Mod
ModMetaData.author: Asierus24 and Asieruso23
ModMetaData.description:
This mod aims to bring the Shin-Ra company (Final Fantasy 7 1997) things (Uniforms,Armors,Weapons,Resources,Buildings,Implants, and others) to Rimworld.
please read the following carefully: --------------------------------- MODS REQUIRED TO WORK ON 1.0:
-Alien Races Framework 2.0 for 1.0 -Jectstools for 1.0 .
MODS REQUIRED TO WORK ON 1.1: -Harmony (Needed for Gelnika addon) -Alien Races Framework 2.0
----------------------------------
ISSUES:
-the only one that can cause problems it's Combat Extended mod, the weapons added by Shin-Ra Mod do not use ammo and can be OP with the mod activated, there may be more issues.
-ANY mod that alters these files may be incompatible (not sure): CommonMapGenerator.xml
--------------------------------------
Load Order for 1.0: -Core -Alien Races Framework 2.0 for 1.0 (must always load before) -Jectstools for 1.0 (must always load before) -(other mods needs and cores) -Shin-Ra Company mod for 1.0
Load Order for 1.1: -Harmony (Needed for Gelnika addon) -Core -DLC -Alien Races Framework 2.0 (Needed only for Shin-Ra Company mod ) -(other mods needs and cores) -Shin-Ra Company mod -SRTS Expanded (Needed only for Gelnika addon) -Shin-Ra Gelnika addon. (not required but recommended if you want to fly in Shin-Ra Style)
Jectstools NOT NEEDED FOR 1.1
¡¡¡¡¡REQUIRES START A NEW COLONY!!! -------------------------------------- Future plans: -Add more equipment. -Add more furniture and decorations.(Maybe) -Add more Final Fantasy 7 monsters.
